CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 17, 1943, page 9 reads: "The betrothal of pretty Betty Anderson, daughter of Mr. And Mrs. William E. Anderson of Ingram, Pa., to Chester L. Washington Jr., secretary and assistant business manager of the Pittsburgh Courier, was announced recently by the bride-to-be's mother at a luncheon party. The wedding will probably take place next month. --Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Betty Anderson, wearing dark dress with long sleeves, diamond smocked top, and butterfly brooch, posed in Harris Studio with circular backdrop
